article_title: Meltzer: Ben Carson and the Tsarnaev verdict
article_text:
By Rob Meltzer

Guest Columnist

Posted May 27, 2015 at 11:03 AM

Updated May 27, 2015 at 11:27 AM

article_metadata.description: I submit that no resident of the commonwealth of Massachusetts who supports Obamacare or who voted for Obama in any election has any right to object, morally, politically, culturally or philosophically, to the imposition of the death sentence received by Dzhokar Tsarnaev in a federal courtroom in Boston.Obamacare and the federal death penalty arise from the same political philosophy represented by Barack Obama and Elizabeth Warren and much of the current Democratic Party—that the federal
